page.title: 02ARTS&CRAFTS RAFFORD AREA
page.content: We went to the Rafford area to do our Domesday project. Heather and I had to find out about Art and Craft.We sent a questionnaire sheet to 41 houses. We found that the main craft was needle-work. Almost 50% of the people did needle-work. The next most popular craft was ceramics and another popular craft was model making.One man in the village makes violins and repairs them as well.Another makes and sells furniture. Other crafts were making soft toys, carving and basket weaving. The most popular Art work was painting while 10 people did sketching.8 people did them both.Photography was also popular and 6 people have exhibited their work.
